explains: n. 机器人学；机器人（robotic的复数）

sentences.en: Isaac Asimov evaded the whole notion of morality in devising his three laws of robotics.
sentences.cn: 艾萨克·阿西莫夫在制定他的机器人三定律时，刻意避开了道德问题。

sentences.en: To be sure, robotics are not the only job killers out there, with outsourcing stealing far more gigs than automation.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定的是，机器人并不是唯一的工作杀手，外包偷走的工作比自动化多得多。

sentences.en: A roboticist at the Bristol Robotics Laboratory programmed a robot to save human proxies called "H-bots" from danger.
sentences.cn: 英国布里斯托机器人实验室的机器人专家编写了从危险中拯救称为“H-bots”的人类代理的机器人。
